articles.author: Pranshu Verma
articles.title: U.S. and India seal trade deal after months of diplomatic tensions - The Washington Post
articles.description: The United States and India finalized a trade agreement Monday, helping stabilize a relationship that had been in decline during Trump’s second term.
articles.content: NEW DELHI The United States and India finalized a long-sought trade agreement Monday after months of rancorous negotiations, steadying a relationship that had plummeted to its lowest point in decades.
